meanings.definition: relating to the exploration and study of caves
meanings.sent1: The speleological team discovered a hidden cavern deep underground.
meanings.sent2: The scientists conducted speleological research to understand the cave system.
meanings.sent3: The speleological expedition brought back fascinating cave samples.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a speleological journey, exploring the depths of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The speleological findings illuminated the mysteries of the underground world.

meanings.definition: a person who studies caves and their formations
meanings.sent1: The speleological shared interesting cave facts with the group.
meanings.sent2: Many speleologists dedicate their lives to understanding caves.
meanings.sent3: The speleological's flashlight went out in the middle of the cave tour.
meanings.sent4: She was a speleological enthusiast, always eager to explore new caves.
meanings.sent5: The speleological's passion for caves was contagious among the team.
